org.mockito.junit

类 MockitoJUnitRunner.StrictStubs

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.junit.runner.Runner
      • org.mockito.junit.MockitoJUnitRunner
        • org.mockito.junit.MockitoJUnitRunner.StrictStubs
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    org.junit.runner.Describable, org.junit.runner.manipulation.Filterable
    封闭类:
    MockitoJUnitRunner

    public static class MockitoJUnitRunner.StrictStubs
extends MockitoJUnitRunner
    Improves debugging tests, helps keeping the tests clean. Highly recommended to improve productivity and quality of tests. Planned default behavior for Mockito v3. Adds behavior equivalent to Strictness.STRICT_STUBS.

    Usage: 

    
 @RunWith(MockitoJUnitRunner.StrictStubs.class)
 public class ExampleTest {
   // ...
 }
    从以下版本开始:
    2.5.1
